About

ShipBlu makes shipping easier and more predictable using combinatorial optimization methods. Please, visit our website at https://shipblu.com to get connected to our team.

This Documentation

This documentation is meant to be read by developers of existing clients of ShipBlu. Running code in this guide requires an API key from your merchant account with ShipBlu.

If you want to sign up for a merchant account, visit our website at https://shipblu.com to talk to our team.

Issues

If you find issues with this documentation, please create and issue on GitHub.

Feature Requests

Want to streamline more business operations on your end? We would love to hear from you by creating a feature request on GitHub.

Contact Us

Get in touch with our engineering team by emailing tech@shipblu.com
